summary: When a Swiss cop is murdered, a veteran homicide inspector and a rookie are assigned to solve the case but they are obstructed by interfering Swiss politicians.
cast: Jon Voight|Jacqueline Bisset|Martin Ritt|Robert Shaw|Helmut Qualtinger|Friedrich Dürrenmatt|Lil Dagover|Gabriele Ferzetti|Rudolf Hubacher|Rudolf Hunsperger|Norbert Schiller|Rita Calderoni|Guido Cerniglia|Willy Hügli|Margarete Schell Noé|Otto Ryser|Toni Roth|Wieland Liebske|Maximilian Schell|Donald Sutherland|Pinchas Zukerman
title: El puente sobre Estambul
